title: Ash
description: My Hostage. Her Secret. Our Enemy.Taking the commissioner’s daughter wasn’t part of the plan. It should have been an easy smash and grab. Instead I captured Lara, so scared and helpless…I never want to let her go.I’m obsessed with her. A Bratva shouldn’t be this close to the law. But I can’t keep my hands off her.My desire for this girl is an inferno, threatening to consume everything I hold dear.She has a dark past, and an even darker purpose...I’ll have to pry her secrets out of her. Before they destroy us both.You won’t want to miss the mysterious, terrifying, and insanely sexy conclusion to the bestselling Colors of Crime series! As always, “Ash” is a stand-alone Dark Mafia Romance, complete with HEA and no cliffhangers. For mature readers only!!!
author: Sophie Lark
